subTitle: Manage your courses and track your teaching success.

createCourseModal.title: Create New Course
createCourseModal.label: Course Title *
createCourseModal.errorFallback: Choose a clear, descriptive name that tells students what they'll learn.
createCourseModal.placeholder: Enter your course name (e.g., Complete React Developer Course)

description.title: What happens next?
description.item0: • You'll be taken to the course builder

courses.delConfirmText: Once you delete this course, you will not be able to retrieve it again.
